question: Please provide the source Hadith and translation of this Du’aa: Allahummakfinee bi halaalika a’n haraamika wa aghnee bi fadhlika a’mman siwaaka
answer:
QUESTION
I have come across the following Du?aa to become debt-free
ANSWER


Share:
O Allah, make us independent from Haraam and make us independent from others
out of your mercy.

This Hadith is found in most of the six authentic books of Hadith.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
